detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.text: So climate change is very real thing and the fact supports this.

grammar.corrected_text: To climate change is very real thing and the fact supports this.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Tiny language hiccups here and there; nothing distracting. You stayed right on point — every word ties beautifully into the topic. Positive tone all around — it draws the reader in naturally. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat. Strongly focused *and* full of positive energy — that’s a rare combo.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2
detailed_analysis.text: Climate change Climate is changing due to a lot of pollution and we cannot face these disasters.

grammar.corrected_text: Climate change Climate is changing due to a lot of pollution and we cannot face these disasters.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. Your ideas connect to the topic, but could use a bit more precision in parts. Comes off somewhat negative; try framing critiques in a more constructive tone. Emotionally steady — well-balanced delivery overall.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Your writing reads effortlessly — very few grammar hiccups. You consistently bring the conversation back to the main idea. Nicely done.
speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Fluent and clean. It’s a pleasure to read your phrasing. You hold the thread of the discussion well, with small detours here and there.
